sections.heading: to 15-1B-9 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1996, ch. 44, § 9, repealed 15-1B-1 to 15-1B-9 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1996, ch. 44, §§ 1 to 8, 11 NMSA 1978, relating to the Information and Communication Management Act, effective July 1, 1998. For present provisions,see15-1C-1 NMSA 1978.
